title: Bug 18268: Images and Files Not Found in NL-Specific Subdirectories
description: Bug 18268: The software is not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories (Build 200205291235).
OB: When opening the about dialog in Eclipse, the main image is not displayed as expected.
EB: The expected behavior is that the main image should be displayed correctly in the about dialog when the software is configured to use NL-specific subdirectories for image files.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Start Eclipse.
2. Delete the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif.
3. Edit the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini and change the value of the aboutImage property to 'aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif'.
4. Edit the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini again and change the value of the aboutImage property to 'aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif'.
5. Exit Eclipse.
6. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif down into an NL-specific subdirectory; i.e., move it to <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif>.
7. Start Eclipse again.
